Drivers should be free to race each other

questions.question: Which track type do you enjoy most?
options: Street circuits with walls close to the track
Classic tracks with history and character

questions.question: What's your approach to risk-taking?
options: Calculate risk vs. reward before any move
Take big risks only when necessary

questions.question: How do you handle pressure situations?
options: Thrive under pressure - bring it on!
Adapt my approach based on the situation

teams.name: Mercedes AMG Petronas
teams.subtitle: The Silver Arrows
teams.description: Mercedes combines technical excellence with efficiency. A dominant force in the turbo-hybrid era, their approach emphasizes engineering precision and systematic improvement.

teams.name: Red Bull Racing
teams.subtitle: The Bulls
teams.description: Red Bull thrives on boldness and aggressive strategy. With a focus on aerodynamic excellence, they favor drivers who push limits and can handle a car that's quick but sometimes challenging.

teams.name: Scuderia Ferrari
teams.subtitle: The Prancing Horse
teams.description: F1's most storied team blends tradition with passion. Ferrari values heritage while pursuing excellence, with an emotional approach to racing that resonates with fans worldwide.

teams.name: McLaren
teams.subtitle: The Papaya
teams.description: McLaren balances innovation with racing heritage. With renewed momentum, they combine technical precision with a positive team culture and strategic intelligence.

teams.name: Aston Martin
teams.subtitle: The Green Team
teams.description: Aston Martin exemplifies British engineering with ambitious goals. Their methodical approach focuses on steady progress while building a foundation for future success.

teams.name: Alpine F1 Team
teams.subtitle: The French Flag
teams.description: Alpine brings French flair to Formula 1 with a focus on technical innovation and efficiency. Their balanced approach prioritizes smart resource allocation and consistent improvement.

teams.name: Williams Racing
teams.subtitle: The Grove-based Team
teams.description: Williams combines rich heritage with a renewed push toward competitiveness. Their approach values technical ingenuity and driver development with a fighting spirit.

teams.name: Haas F1 Team
teams.subtitle: The American Outfit
teams.description: Haas takes a pragmatic approach to Formula 1, focusing on efficiency and smart resource allocation. They value straightforward solutions and adaptability.

teams.name: Kick Sauber
teams.subtitle: The Swiss Precision
teams.description: Sauber combines Swiss precision with racing passion. Their methodical approach focuses on technical excellence and driver development with an eye toward the future.

teams.name: VCARB Racing Bulls
teams.subtitle: The Sister Team
teams.description: Racing Bulls combines Italian flair with Red Bull DNA. They focus on developing young talent while providing a proving ground for innovative technical solutions.

drivers.name: Lewis Hamilton
drivers.subtitle: 7-time World Champion
drivers.description: Combines natural talent with meticulous preparation. Hamilton excels in all conditions and is known for both speed and consistency. A master of tire management and race craft.

drivers.name: Max Verstappen
drivers.subtitle: The Flying Dutchman
drivers.description: Aggressive, fearless and exceptionally talented. Verstappen has lightning reflexes and an instinctive racing style, always pushing to the absolute limit in any situation.

drivers.name: Charles Leclerc
drivers.subtitle: The Monegasque Prince
drivers.description: Combines raw speed with emotional determination. Leclerc is exceptional in qualifying, with a driving style that's both precise and passionate - always giving everything for the team.

drivers.name: Lando Norris
drivers.subtitle: The Rising Star
drivers.description: A new generation talent with exceptional adaptability. Norris combines natural speed with a thoughtful approach to racing and strong technical feedback.

drivers.name: Oscar Piastri
drivers.subtitle: The Rookie Sensation
drivers.description: Calm, composed and remarkably consistent. Piastri combines a methodical approach with natural speed and excellent race craft beyond his years.

drivers.name: George Russell
drivers.subtitle: Mr. Saturday
drivers.description: Combines raw speed with analytical thinking. Russell excels in qualifying and brings a meticulous, engineering-focused approach to his driving with excellent technical feedback.

drivers.name: Andrea Kimi Antonelli
drivers.subtitle: The Prodigy
drivers.description: A remarkable young talent with exceptional feel for the car. Antonelli combines raw speed with mature racecraft, showing adaptability and composure beyond his years.

drivers.name: Sergio Perez
drivers.subtitle: The Tire Whisperer
drivers.description: Master of tire management and race strategy. Perez combines intelligent racing with a team-focused approach and exceptional skill in preserving his equipment.

drivers.name: Carlos Sainz
drivers.subtitle: The Smooth Operator
drivers.description: Intelligent, consistent and technically astute. Sainz brings a methodical approach to racing with excellent adaptability and race pace, regardless of conditions.

drivers.name: Alexander Albon
drivers.subtitle: The Comeback Kid
drivers.description: Resilient, technically adept and intelligent. Albon excels at extracting maximum performance from limited resources with excellent race craft and consistency.

drivers.name: Fernando Alonso
drivers.subtitle: El Matador
drivers.description: The complete package of experience, race craft and determination. Alonso adapts to any car or condition, with strategic intelligence and unmatched first-lap abilities.

drivers.name: Lance Stroll
drivers.subtitle: The Racer
drivers.description: Capable in all conditions with particular strength in the wet. Stroll combines determination with a straightforward approach to racing and strong race pace.

drivers.name: Pierre Gasly
drivers.subtitle: The Phoenix
drivers.description: Resilient and technically skilled. Gasly brings a balanced approach to racing with excellent adaptability and a particular talent for maximizing opportunities.

drivers.name: Esteban Ocon
drivers.subtitle: The Fighter
drivers.description: Tenacious and determined with excellent defensive skills. Ocon brings a combative racing style with technical precision and unwavering focus.

drivers.name: Jack Doohan
drivers.subtitle: The Racing Pedigree
drivers.description: Son of motorcycle legend Mick Doohan, Jack brings raw speed with an aggressive style. His approach combines Australian grit with technical intelligence.

drivers.name: Nico Hulkenberg
drivers.subtitle: The Veteran
drivers.description: Experienced and technically excellent with outstanding speed on a single lap. Hulkenberg brings a mature approach with exceptional car control and technical feedback.

drivers.name: Valtteri Bottas
drivers.subtitle: The Iceman
drivers.description: Extremely fast over one lap with a calm, analytical approach. Bottas brings technical precision with a quietly determined attitude and excellent team ethic.

drivers.name: Oliver Bearman
drivers.subtitle: The British Talent
drivers.description: A promising young driver who combines speed with consistency. Bearman brings a focused approach with excellent adaptability and strong race craft.

drivers.name: Yuki Tsunoda
drivers.subtitle: The Fiery Talent
drivers.description: Combines raw speed with improving consistency. Tsunoda brings passion and determination with an increasingly mature approach to racing and strong technical feedback.

drivers.name: Liam Lawson
drivers.subtitle: The Kiwi Racer
drivers.description: Aggressive and determined with excellent race craft. Lawson brings New Zealand grit with a fearless racing style and strong adaptability to different conditions.
